name: Hold the Line (itch) (Michael Merritt, Matthew Merritt)
name_original: Hold the Line (itch) (Michael Merritt, Matthew Merritt)
description:
(This game was made for the Quinnipiac Game Developers Club eJam 2.)

The goal is to push and pull your units in a way that allows you to defeat all of the enemy units without losing all of your units or running out of turns. Are you up for the challenge?

There are a total of four tutorial levels and four main gameplay levels. The controls can be found by going to the controls menu from the main menu.

The Unity project and code for the game can be found here: https://github.com/mikepmerritt/Hold-the-Line

This game was made by Matthew Merritt and Michael Merritt. The font is Minitel by Frédéric Bisson (https://www.dafont.com/minitel.font). All other assets and code were made by Matthew Merritt and Michael Merritt.
